sentences.en: He conducted as personally through the mansion.
sentences.cn: 他亲自领我们到大厦各处参观.

sentences.en: He remains barricaded inside his heavily-fortified mansion.
sentences.cn: 他在自己防卫森严的宅院里把自己与外界隔绝开来。

sentences.en: I found General Yang in a newly finished stone mansion.
sentences.cn: 我在一所新近竣工的石宅里见到了杨将军.

sentences.en: I laid foundation on earth for a mansion in heaven.
sentences.cn: 为了在天堂里建造大厦我把奠基石放在人间.

sentences.en: Security experts wired up dozens of expensive plants to the main alarm system at his mansion.
sentences.cn: 安防专家在数十株名贵苗木上布线,使与其别墅的主控警报系统连接.

sentences.en: So they live in a mansion Big deal!
sentences.cn: 那么他们住在大楼里喽,(有什么)了不起!

sentences.en: The bell was heard clanging loudly through the vast gloomy mansion.
sentences.cn: 响亮的铃声叮叮当当传遍了阴森的大公馆.

sentences.en: The historic mansion was presented by the owner to the city, and is now kept up by the local authority.
sentences.cn: 这幢有历史意义的宅邸是房主送给城市的, 现在由地方当局保养维修.

sentences.en: The hotel has the splendour of a nineteenth - century mansion.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆具有19世纪豪宅的华丽风格.
这大厦四周的庭园广阔.

sentences.en: The old mansion was built in 1850.
The price tag on the 34-room white Regency mansion is £17.5 million.
sentences.cn: 那栋有34个房间的摄政时期的白色官邸报价为1,750万英镑。

sentences.en: The stately mansion crested the hill.

phrases.tran_cn: 大厦之屋，民信大厦；府邸
